data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Ruse, Bulgaria to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ruse, Bulgaria
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Ruse, Bulgaria.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 50 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Ruse, Bulgaria.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Ruse.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Pomak people.
Jesus, defend your people in the state of Ruse against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Ruse, Bulgaria so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Ruse.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.
